ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death
ygData.msgSnippet: Nice of them to tell us.  If you look at the wording, the only reason they bothered was because some had it as a spell.  If they nerf mend or some other monk
ygData.messageBody:
Nice of them to tell us. If you look at the wording, the only reason
they bothered was because some had it as a spell. If they nerf
mend or some other monk only skill, they will NEVER mention it in
the patch message, it seems. Does this bother anyone else?


From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>

I would suggest you check out this message board.

http://server3.ezboard.com/feverquestmonksfeigndeathnerf

also with the patch messagelast night they did admit to changes in FD but it
is still nerfed where it matter the most. and that is the higher levels.
